modName: Legacy of The Dragonborn Patch Central
summary: This page is the central hub for all Legacy of the Dragonborn patches and the central home of the Legacy FOMOD patcher which will include all the latest patches in an easy to use installer.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=#0000ff][img]http://i.imgur.com/ECVhMhC.jpg[/img][/color]

[color=#00ff00]Patch Development Team[/color][/b]
[size=3]Icecreamassassin - Mod/ Patch author
JCBQ - FOMOD writer/ Patch Central Co-Admin.
SirJesto - [/size][/size][size=3]Support patch author/ Patch Central Co-Admin[/size][size=5][size=3]
[/size][/size]
[size=3]
The file section is broken down as follows:[/size][color=#0000ff][size=6]
[/size][/color]

[b][color=#00ff00]MAIN files:[/color][/b] The main Legacy FOMOD with the most current version of Patches.

[b][color=#00ff00]UPDATE files:[/color][/b]  Updated patches made by Icecreamassassin or from another author and confirmed to be accurate and endorsed by ICA that are newer than those contained in the MAIN FOMOD.

[b][color=#00ff00]OPTIONAL files:[/color][/b] Other patches that are not included in the Patch FOMOD packages, but may be useful for a Legacy playthrough.

[b][color=#00ff00]MISC files:[/color][/b] Additional patches provided by other modders or third party mod authors but should be perfectly good to use.

[b][color=#00ff00]OLD files:[/color][/b] Archive of older FOMOD packages and files.

For more information, please visit the full mod page located here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52248/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52248/?[/url]

If you encounter any errors with the FOMOD or patches contained here please let us know either here (preferred) or on the official Mod page so that the issues can be looked at in a timely manner.

For NMM users please be aware that it is highly recommended to backup your skyrim install before installing these patches and the core mod.


[center][size=5][u][color=#00ff00]Supported Mods[/color]
[/u][/size][/center][size=3]These mods have [b][i]auto detections within Legacy[/i][/b] and don't require any additional support.[/size]


[color=#ffff00]Wheels of Lull[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58672/?
Triggers a quest display in the hall of the dragonborn that supports items within the Hall of the Dragonborn

[color=#ffff00]Undeath[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40607/?
Triggers a quest display within the Dragonborn Hall
(Please ensure that the Patcher installs the additional item support patch)

[color=#ffff00]Immersive College of Winterhold[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36849/?
Moves a Legacy specific relic container, integrating items,as well as ensuring that all items in question don't conflict

[color=#ffff00]Skyrim Unique Treasures (AKA SUT)[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12766/?
Adds a sizable room to the hall of Oddities with many items to collect and display

[color=#ffff00]Great Jar Hunt[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25956/?
Adds a small room to the hall of oddities to display many of the jars

[color=#ffff00]Captured Fairies[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62340/?
Adds a series of shelves to the hall of natural science to display the fairies

[color=#ffff00]Something Fishy[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63537/?
Adds a series of shelves to the hall of natural science's aquarium to display the fish

[color=#ffff00]Trophy Heads[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69522/?
Adds a small room in the hall of oddities to display this collection

[color=#ffff00]Konahrik's Accoutrements[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458/?
Adds specific mannequins to the hall of the Dragonborn with full dedication to the known dragon priests as well as their Armors. Please ensure the installer installs the item patch

[color=#ffff00]Aetherium Armor and weapons[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23530/?
Adds an additional room within the hall of lost empires to display all of the Aetherium Equipment

[color=#ffff00]Helgen Reborn[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35841/?
Adds a dedicated display and relics to be displayed in the Hall of the Dragonborn
(Please ensure that the Patcher installs the additional dig site support patch)

[color=#ffff00]Wyrmstooth[/color] - Please see reddit and private messages for access
Adds dedicated displays to the Hall of Dragonborn

[color=#ffff00]Hunterborn[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33201/?
Integrates and changes required items so that the sorting and crafting systems are compatible

[color=#ffff00]Falskaar[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?
Adds a dedicated display in the hall of heroes for items

[color=#ffff00]Gray Cowl of Nocturnal[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64651/?
Adds display support throughout the museum

[color=#ffff00]Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?
Allows the player to become a relic hunter by choosing the following option at the start of the game Boat -> Solitude -> then selecting yes when asked

[color=#ffff00]Cloaks of Skyrim[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?
Cloaks of Skyrim is supported automatically in Legacy, providing unique cloak displays in the safe house. It also supports CCOR's versions of the Cloaks. 


[color=#ffff00]True City of Solitude[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60430/?
[color=#ffff00]Complete Solitude[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36061/?
[size=2][color=#ffff00]Solitude Reborn[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63685/?
[color=#ffff00]Towns and Villages Enhanced[/color] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21148/?[/size]
[center][/center]

[size=5][center][/center][/size][center][/center][size=5][u][color=#00ff00]Patches Supplied by the main Installer
[/color]
[/u][/size][size=3]These patches are integrated within the installer with a fully operable auto detection system to help assist with selection.[/size]


-Open Cities Skyrim
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?
 Provides Navmesh and static support for the museum. Requires a new save on initial install

-Solitude Capital Edition
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52117/?

-Solitude Bathhouse
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18811/?

 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77346/?

-Mad Masker
 This provides gallery support in the hall of oddities, by making several adjustments to the store and many items. Please read the Readme for more information. 
[color=#ff0000]The Mad masker is no longer available on the nexus.[/color]

-Artifacts of Boethiah
 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67987/?
 Provides support by enabling the specific versions of Frank Family's mod

 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57113/?

[u][b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Miscellaneous Patches

[/size][/color][/b][/u]-DBM_CACOV1.2_Patch
Compatibility Patch for Legacy v19 and CACO v1.2 (CACO v2.0 patch is in the MAIN FOMOD.)

-DBM_DDL_MIL_Patches
Combined patch for users of Dynamic Dungeon Loot and More interesting Loot or MIL+OAP(Removes the need for the DDL+MIL patch on DDL's mod page. Use only one of the .esp's contained in the archive. Patches by SkyLover264

-Requiem v2.0.2 Patches
Requiem patches for v2.0.2 of that mod. (Requiem v1.9.4 patches are in the MAIN FOMOD.)
Only use ONE version of the patch that matches your setup!

-LOTD Patches Merged
Merged patch specifically made for SRLE Extended: Legacy of The Dragonborn.


[size=4]There is partial support and compatibility with Perkus Maximus[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=2]Issues are well documented on the legacy page however they are minor, allowing for the mod to 'play nice' with legacy for the most part[/size][size=3].

[center]﻿[/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Eb2FDgL.png[/img][/center][/size]
author: Icecreamassassin and jcbq and SirJesto

files.name: Book Covers Skyrim - Legacy Compatibility Patches
files.fileName: Book Covers Skyrim - Legacy Compatibility Patches-72921-19-0-8.7z
files.changelogHtml:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.0.8 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated the "MIL+OAP" patch.
(Fixed the Navmesh issue)

- Updated the "Mad Masker" patch.
(Added missing mesh for Mara's Hammer)

- Updated the "Open Cities" patch.
(Professor Marassi will now appear correctly)

- Added the "Skyrim Underground" patch back to this FOMOD.
(It has been moved from the "Optional Mod Patches for Legacy" FOMOD)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Optional Mod Patches for Legacy v19.0.8

- Updated "Another Sorting Mod" Patch.

- Updated "Realistic Solitude Arch" Patch.
(The patch is supposed to be a replacer .esp but the fact that it had the DBM_ naming convention made it so you could have the Legacy version and the regular mod loaded at the same time.
The name has been changed to the same as the regular version of the mod so it now actually acts as a replacer .esp.)
If you have DBM_RealisticSolitudeArch_Patch, you can delete it from your load order.

- Removed the "Skyrim Underground" patch from this FOMOD.
(It is now BACK in the main FOMOD)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updated "Book Covers Skyrim - Legacy Compatibility Pack" in the OPTIONAL file section.

(Update to the BCS - RALSS (Read And Learn Speechcraft Speech) Patch)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Updated "LOTD Patches Merged" file for users of SRLE Extended: Legacy of The Dragonborn in the MISCELLANEOUS file section.
(Added the "vigilant" patch to the merge - For real this time)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.1.6 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated "Solitude Skyway" patch.
(cleaned the plugin)
- Updated "Undeath" patch.
(Replaced "The Path of Transcendence" book from Undeath with the Legacy version)
- Updated the "Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade" and the " DBM_WAF_CCF_CCOR " Combo patch.
(Added missing record for the "Zephyr" bow)

Optional Mod Patches for Legacy v19.1.6 in the OPTIONAL file section.

- Added " Dawnguard and Clan Volkihar Epilogues " patch to the FOMOD.
- Added " Dawnguard and Clan Volkihar Epilogues and Legendary Skyrim Crossbows/Proper Crossbow Integration " combo patch to the FOMOD.
- Added "The Useless Shop and Interiors Overhaul" patch to the FOMOD.
- Added "The Useless Shop and Interiors Overhaul and Skyrim Unique Treasures" combo patch to the FOMOD.

Updated "LOTD Patches Merged" file for users of SRLE Extended: Legacy of The Dragonborn in the MISCELLANEOUS file section.
(Includes the relevent updates from the main files)

Scripts to clean

dbm_dgitemdelivery01script
dbm_dgitemdelivery02script
dbm_dgitemdeliveryscript03
QF_Sky_DawnguardArtifactsQST_0600AA0A

(Only if using the Dawnguard and Clan Volkihar Epilogues mod)

files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated DBM_HA+IA+DG_Patch patch.
(Fixed missing Dawnguard arsenal form data and removed column in armory)

- Updated the "Moon and Star" patch.
(Repairs Magebane havoc and equip issues which can cause a CTD)

- Updated "Artifacts of Boethiah" patch.
(Updated to be compatible with new version)

- Updated "Sands of Time" patch.
(Updated for new version of that mod)

files.name: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection
files.fileName: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection-72921-19-3-5.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3.5 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated "Artifacts of Boethiah" patch.
(Fixed Fearstruck display, Book text matches AoB mod now. Added displays for "Boethiah's Walking Staff" and "Shashev's Ring")

- Updated "More Interesting Loot" Patch.
(Streamlined the FormLists for compatibility. This paves the way for the removal of Combo patches coming soon)

- Updated "Oblivion Artifacts Pack" Patch.
(Streamlined the FormLists for compatibility. This paves the way for the removal of Combo patches coming soon)

- Updated some "Immersive Armors" Patches.
(Dremora will have armor now)

- Updated the "Royal Armory" patch.
(Temporary Fix for the issue of the items not auto-sorting. Exquisite Elven Blade will need to be placed manually still)
(Removed the "fix" for the season unending CTD as the newest version of Royal Armory (2.2) fixes this)

- Updated all versions of the "Requiem" Patches in the MISCELLANEOUS file section.
(Updated to be compatible with v2.0 - Use only ONE version of the patch that matches your setup!)

files.name: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection
files.fileName: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection-72921-19-3-6.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3.6 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated all "Immersive Armors" Patches.
(Fixed floating candles on the Tribunal Mask display)

- Updated "Artifacts of Boethiah" patch.
(Updated Book script to match v2.1 of AoB)


Updated Optional Mod Patches for Legacy to v19.3.6 in the OPTIONAL file section.

- ADDED "Namira for Good Guys" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of the ring even if you decide to give it to Brother Verulus with this mod)

- ADDED "Barely Used Vanilla Actors Recycle Project (BUVARP)" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of Aegisbane even if you decide to return it to Torbjorn with this mod)

- ADDED "House of Horrors - Alternate Ending" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of Molag Baal's Mace even if you don't recieve it using this mod)

- REMOVED "MorrowLoot Ultimate" Patch from the FOMOD.
(Users of this mod should use the Legacy patch from that mod's page)

files.name: Optional Mod Patches for Legacy.
files.fileName: Optional Mod Patches for Legacy.-72921-19-3-6.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3.6 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated all "Immersive Armors" Patches.
(Fixed floating candles on the Tribunal Mask display)

- Updated "Artifacts of Boethiah" patch.
(Updated Book script to match v2.1 of AoB)


Updated Optional Mod Patches for Legacy to v19.3.6 in the OPTIONAL file section.

- ADDED "Namira for Good Guys" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of the ring even if you decide to give it to Brother Verulus with this mod)

- ADDED "Barely Used Vanilla Actors Recycle Project (BUVARP)" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of Aegisbane even if you decide to return it to Torbjorn with this mod)

- ADDED "House of Horrors - Alternate Ending" patch to the FOMOD.
(Allows you to create a replica of Molag Baal's Mace even if you don't recieve it using this mod)

- REMOVED "MorrowLoot Ultimate" Patch from the FOMOD.
(Users of this mod should use the Legacy patch from that mod's page)

files.name: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection.
files.fileName: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection.-72921-19-3-6-5.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3.6.5 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated the "Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade" and the "DBM_WAF_CCF_CCOR" Combo patch.
(Some small updates due to new version of WAFR)

- Updated "Vigilant" patch.
(Replaced Butcher's Knife display with Blacksmith's Hammer Display. Ada Bal replica is now craftable)

- Updated the "Moon and Star" patch.
(Corrects issue with Book from Kagrenar not displaying)

Removed the link to Mad Masker in the patch description

files.name: Tools of Kagrenac Patch
files.fileName: Tools of Kagrenac Patch-72921-19-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3 in the MAIN file section.

- Updated DBM_HA+IA+DG_Patch patch.
(Fixed missing Dawnguard arsenal form data and removed column in armory)

- Updated the "Moon and Star" patch.
(Repairs Magebane havoc and equip issues which can cause a CTD)

- Updated "Artifacts of Boethiah" patch.
(Updated to be compatible with new version)

- Updated "Sands of Time" patch.
(Updated for new version of that mod)

files.name: Tools of Kagrenac Patch V1
files.fileName: Tools of Kagrenac Patch V1-72921-19-3.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3 in the MAIN file section.

files.name: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection
files.fileName: Legacy of the Dragonborn Patch Collection-72921-19-3-6-6.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Updated main FOMOD installer to v19.3.6.6 in the MAIN file section.


- ADDED "The Tools of Kagrenac" patch to the FOMOD.

- Updated the "Clothing and Clutter Fixes" patch.
(Updated for the latest version of the mod - v2.2)
- Updated the "Weapons Armor Fixes Remade" patch.
(Updated for the latest version of the mod - v5.4)
- Updated the "DBM_WAF_CCF_CCOR" Combo patch.
(Updated for the latest versions of CCF and WAFR)
- UPDATED "Audio Overhaul for Skyrim" patch.
(Added changes for some Legacy specific weapons)
- UPDATED "Immersive Sound Compendium" patch.
(Added ISC sounds to Legacy replica's where ISC added them to the originals.)
- UPDATED "Zim's Immersive Artifacts" patch.
(corrected Light versions of Spellbreaker, Ebony Mail and Masque of Clavicus Vile.)

* In the MISCELLANIOUS file section *
- Updated all versions of the "Requiem" patches.
(Updated for the latest version of the mod - v2.02)
